title: Convict

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, you may become a random new Countryfolk role not currently present in-game, replacing your current attributes and abilities with those of the new role. You keep your background.
- At night, if you have not chosen a new role, you may choose to Meditate, choosing any Countryfolk role, including those already present in-game. After meditating two times about a role, the next time you use your day ability you will become that role.

fields.name: Background:
fields.value: - At night, choose to Reflect, choosing any Countryfolk role. If you reflect on the same Countryfolk role twice, you gain their Background.
